comment: : Darren Wilson got $500k from ABC for interview, plus $500k for donations... he is a killer millionaire, literally
amr:
# ::snt : Darren Wilson got $500k from ABC for interview, plus $500k for donations... he is a killer millionaire, literally
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (g / get-01
            :ARG0 (p / person
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "Darren"
                        :op2 "Wilson"))
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (m2 / monetary-quantity
                        :quant 500000
                        :unit (d / dollar)
                        :purpose (ii / interview-01
                              :ARG1 p))
                  :op2 (m3 / monetary-quantity
                        :quant 50000
                        :unit (d2 / dollar)
                        :purpose (d3 / donate-01)))
            :ARG2 (p2 / publication
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "ABC")))
      :snt2 (m4 / millionaire
            :ARG0-of (k / kill-01)
            :domain p
            :manner (l / literal)))
